## Workspace.removeChangeListener() method

Stop listening for this workspace's changes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeChangeListener(func: Function): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  func | Function | Function to stop calling. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
